publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3350 Michael Matheson: Scottish Opera—That the Parliament notes the comments of Duncan McGhie, former Chairman of Scottish Opera and Scottish Ballet; agrees with his comments that Scotland should be funding its own opera company, and strongly resists any attempt to merge Scottish Opera with another opera company outside Scotland which would threaten the independence of the production of opera in Scotland. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Linda Fabiani*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3350 Scottish Opera (lodged on 27 September 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Richard Lochhead*, Mike Rumbles*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-3350 Scottish Opera (lodged on 27 September 2005) Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-3350 Michael Matheson: Scottish Opera—That the Parliament notes the comments of Duncan McGhie, former Chairman of Scottish Opera and Scottish Ballet; agrees with his comments that Scotland should be funding its own opera company, and strongly resists any attempt to merge Scottish Opera with another opera company outside Scotland which would threaten the independence of the production of opera in Scotland. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Linda Fabiani, Donald Gorrie, Mr Adam Ingram, Richard Lochhead, Mike Rumbles, Mr John Swinney, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mike Pringle, Dr Jean Turner, Alex Neil*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3350 Scottish Opera (lodged on 27 September 2005) Colin Fox*
S2M-3350 Scottish Opera (lodged on 27 September 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3350 Scottish Opera (lodged on 27 September 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
